meanings.definition: To write, print, or enter on a scroll or in a scroll-like form.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed inscrolling her thoughts on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The scribe was inscrolling the important information on the parchment.
meanings.sent3: The wizard inscrolling his magical spells on a mystical scroll.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were inscrolling like an endless tapestry of moments.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush inscrolling vibrant colors on the canvas.

meanings.definition: To record or document in a scroll-like manner.
meanings.sent1: The historian was inscrolling the events of the battle on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: Students were inscrolling notes during the lecture.
meanings.sent3: The detective inscrolling clues on a mysterious scroll.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to be inscrolling slowly, like a never-ending story.
meanings.sent5: The writer was inscrolling the details of the adventure in a scroll.
